001package org.nasdanika.common;
002
003/**
004 * Something that can be adapted to a different type.  Can be used to access contextual information.
005 * @author Pavel
006 *
007 */
008public interface Adaptable {
009        
010        /**
011         * Adapts to requested type.
012         * @param type Type to adapt to.
013         * @return Instance of the type or null.
014         */
015        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
016        default <T> T adaptTo(Class<T> type) {
017                return type.isInstance(this) ? (T) this : null;
018        }
019        
020        /**
021         * Adapts source to requested type.
022         * @param source Source object.
023         * @param type Type to adapt to.
024         * @return Instance of the type or null.
025         */
026        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
027        static <T> T adaptTo(Object source, Class<T> type) {
028                if (source == null) {
029                        return (T) source;
030                }
031                if (type.isInstance(source)) {
032                        return (T) source;
033                }
034                if (source instanceof Adaptable) {
035                        return ((Adaptable) source).adaptTo(type);
036                }
037                return null;
038        }
039
040}
